subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: All the giddy diversion in the next three weeks is based upon a double standard, the unnatural blending of big-time athletics and education. Having said this, I’m ready for the tournament.
snippet: All the giddy diversion in the next three weeks is based upon a double standard, the unnatural blending of big-time athletics and education. Having said this, I’m ready for the tournament.
